name: Natalia Ivanova
routine: Natalia sleeps at 11pm and wakes up at 5:30 am to begin her day.
occupation: She is a seasoned pediatrician who works at a clinic from 8am until 5pm.
thoughts: Natalia recently attended a medical seminar which made her ponder about the integration of artificial intelligence in healthcare. She has been reflecting on this since February 1st, 2024.
lifestyle: She maintains a balanced diet with a preference for organic food. Natalia enjoys gardening in her free time and has a diverse collection of houseplants. She likes to unwind by playing the piano after dinner.
